response.overview: In the near future where emotions have become a threat, Gabrielle finally decides to purify her DNA in a machine that will immerse her in her past lives and rid her of any strong feelings. She then meets Louis and feels a powerful connection, as if she had known him forever.
response.tagline: You remember, don't you? That we have already met?
response.title: The Beast

release_dates.note: Mar del Plata International Film Festival

results.name: Bertrand Bonello on the Modern Anxieties and Fears Explored in The Beast
